text: Kothur G. Manjunath is an Indian politician and former member of the Karnataka Legislative Assembly from the Mulbagal constituency. Manjunath entered the election as an independent candidate, having been denied the ticked by the Congress party, but has later joined the party. In 2015 Manjunath was involved in controversy regarding a caste certificate issued for his brother. ==References== Category:Indian National Congress politicians from Karnataka Category:Living people Category:Members of the Karnataka Legislative Assembly Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Kothur G. Manjunath
